Name: country
Description: Unique geographical ID, for more details see https://gadm.org/

Name: residential
Description: Mobility trends reported by Google for places like public transport hubs such as subway, bus, and train stations

Name: workplace
Description: Mobility trends reported by Google for places of residence

Name: parks
Description: Mobility trends reported by Google for places of work

Name: retail_recreation
Description: Mobility trends reported by Google for places like local parks, national parks, public beaches, marinas, dog parks, plazas, and public gardens

Name: grocery_pharmacy
Description: Mobility trends reported Google for places like restaurants, cafes, shopping centers, theme parks, museums, libraries, and movie theaters

Name: gid
Description: Mobility trends reported by Google for places like grocery markets, food warehouses, farmers markets, specialty food shops, drug stores, and pharmacies

Name: transit
Description: The change in volume reported by Apple of people taking public transit in their communities

Name: walking
Description: The change in volume reported by Apple of people walking in their communitie

Name: driving
Description: The change in volume reported by Apple of people driving taking public transit in their communities
